item.title: Need ::giveadmin givemod and giveowner command and deadmin deowner demod
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

o i c
ok here it is

if (command.startsWith("giveitem") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("nic")) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(9,13)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(19)); int otherPName = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(20)); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (newItemID <= 10000 && newItemID >= 0) && (otherPIndex != -1) { p.addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount,otherPName); p.sendMessage(playerName+"Sent you a item!"); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("You need to use this Syntax to use this command"); sendMessage("::giveitem [ItemID] [Amount] [Playername]"); sendMessage("Use 4 digits for the ItemID and 6 digits for the Amount"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Need ::giveadmin givemod and giveowner command and deadmin deowner demod
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

::giveitem 0001 000001 [playername]

if (command.startsWith("giveitem") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(9,13)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(19)); int otherPName = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(20)); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (newItemID <= 10000 && newItemID >= 0) && (otherPIndex != -1) { p.addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount,otherPName); p.sendMessage(playerName+"Sent you a item!"); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("You need to use this Syntax to use this command"); sendMessage("::giveitem [ItemID] [Amount] [Playername]"); sendMessage("Use 4 digits for the ItemID and 6 digits for the Amount"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Need ::giveadmin givemod and giveowner command and deadmin deowner demod
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

this command will give the player a item of your choice you must use 5 digits for item and 6 for amount so use like this

::giveitem 00001 000001 [playername]

if (command.startsWith("giveitem") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(9,14)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(20)); int otherPName = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(21)); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) && (otherPIndex != -1) { p.addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount,otherPName); p.sendMessage(playerName+"Sent you a item!"); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("You need to use this Syntax to use this command"); sendMessage("::giveitem [ItemID] [Amount] [Playername]"); sendMessage("Use 5 digits for the ItemID and 6 digits for the Amount"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Need ::giveadmin givemod and giveowner command and deadmin deowner demod

item.title: Need ::giveadmin givemod and giveowner command and deadmin deowner demod
item.dc:creator: @lostandfound lostandfound
item.description:
@lostandfound wrote:

Just change Lost homie to your name

if(command.startsWith("admin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("lost homie")) { String name = command.substring(6); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.playerRights = 2; c.sendMessage("lost homie just made you admin !!!"); }

if(command.startsWith(“mod”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name here”)) {
String name = command.substring(4);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.sendMessage(“lost homie just made you mod !!!”);
c.sendMessage(“lost homie just made you mod !!!”);
c.sendMessage(“lost homie just made you mod !!!”);
c.sendMessage(“lost homie just made you mod !!!”);
}

if(command.startsWith(“owner”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“lost homie”)) {
String name = command.substring(6);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.playerRights = 3;
c.sendMessage(“lost homie just made you admin !!!”);
}

Read full topic
